Maverick AV Solutions with: Microsoft

Microsoft Surface Hub 2S

Available in 50” and for pre-order in 85” models.

Take teamwork anywhere with Surface Hub 2S, the all-in-one digital whiteboard and meetings platform that brings the power of Windows 10 to Teams. A powerful 4K camera delivers a full field of view, the responsive Surface Hub 2 Pen delivers precision Surface inking scaled to the large screen.

Surface Hub 2 details

Maverick AV Solutions has teams ready to provide:

  • Registration of Extended Hardware Service
  • Training of sales and technical resellers
  • Post-sale technical support
  • Deployment service
  • Adoption service

Now it’s easier than ever to keep the teamwork flowing – all on a thin, light and mobile device that goes wherever your ideas take you.

Microsoft Teams Rooms

Transform meeting spaces ranging from small huddle areas to large conference rooms with a rich, collaborative Teams experience that's simple to use, deploy, and manage.

Start meetings on time with one-touch join, then instantly project to the display in the room and share to remote participants. Microsoft Teams Rooms can be invited to the meeting through calendar integration, bringin remote participants into the room and utilising collaboration tools that work both in the meeting room and at home. The Maverick team can help select the right system and audio video peripherals from one of our partners: Logitech, Lenovo, and HP.

Microsoft Teams Rooms details

Microsoft Whiteboard

One of the most versatile and crucial of any innovation in 2020, Microsoft Whiteboard creates a visual collaboration experience.

Enabling you to use the same space whether you are penning on an interactive display, of working at home on your tablet or PC. Write with multiple coloured pens, add sticky notes and shapes, bring in presentations and powerpoint files for live annotation and work within your Office environment, all through an all in one collaboration tool. For IT Managers, Whiteboard is part of the Microsoft 365 Admin Centre, and can be accessed and applied to each account.

Microsoft Whiteboard details
